name: Singleton Theory Services
tagline: Exactly one element that won't save the world, but might make it a little easier.
body:
### Welcome to Singleton Theory Services.
This is the holding space where the API Services and reusable components, frameworks and libraries will live.  The content will change as we add new projects and build the components and applications that will make up Singleton Theory's API.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
